response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available to others. Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at an attractive discount. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
